original_text: But someone else may not be sure whether it is right to eat certain kinds of food. If that person does eat that kind of food, then he shows that he is guilty. He has not trusted God that it is right for him to do that. Whatever things we do, we must trust God about them. If we do not trust God that something is right, then it is a sin.
korean_text: 의심하고 먹는 자는 정죄되었나니 이는 믿음을 따라 하지 아니하였기 때문이라 믿음을 따라 하지 아니하는 것은 다 죄니라

sentences.original_text: But someone else may not be sure
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다른 사람은 확실하지 않을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: whether it is right to eat certain kinds of food
sentences.korean_translation: 특정 종류의 음식을 먹는 것이 옳은지

sentences.original_text: If that person does eat that kind of food
then he shows that he is guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 죄가 있다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: that it is right for him to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 하는 것이 자신에게 옳다는 것을

sentences.original_text: we must trust God about them
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그것들에 대해 하나님을 믿어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: If we do not trust God
